com.gembox.spreadsheet

Class XlsLoadOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gembox.spreadsheet.LoadOptions
      • com.gembox.spreadsheet.XlsLoadOptions

  • public final class XlsLoadOptions
extends LoadOptions
    Represents options for loading from XLS file format (Microsoft Excel Spreadsheet format; Excel 2003 and prior versions).
    See Also:
    Open and read Excel file in Java, Convert Excel file to XLS, XLSX, ODS, CSV and HTML in Java

    • Method Detail

      • getPassword

        public String getPassword()
        Gets the password to open protected / encrypted workbook.
        See Also:
        Excel Encryption for XLSX in Java

      • isPreserveUnsupportedFeatures

        public boolean isPreserveUnsupportedFeatures()
        Gets a value indicating whether to preserve XLS file format features that are not directly supported through GemBox.Spreadsheet object model.

        Default value is set to true.

        Returns:
        true to preserve XLS file format features that are not directly supported through GemBox.Spreadsheet object model; otherwise, false.

      • setPassword

        public void setPassword(String password)
        Sets the password to open protected / encrypted workbook.
        See Also:
        Excel Encryption for XLSX in Java

      • setPreserveUnsupportedFeatures

        public void setPreserveUnsupportedFeatures(boolean preserveUnsupportedFeatures)
        Sets a value indicating whether to preserve XLS file format features that are not directly supported through GemBox.Spreadsheet object model.

        Default value is set to true.

        Parameters:
        preserveUnsupportedFeatures - true to preserve XLS file format features that are not directly supported through GemBox.Spreadsheet object model; otherwise, false.
